title: Design of a Flexible Educational Program to Strengthen Customized Vocational Competencies in Science Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate science theories and basic laboratory techniques
context.additional_context: Modular curriculum with high job relevance for in-service professionals, providing real-time feedback through VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world industrial problems in simulation environments with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can design scientific problem-solving procedures step-by-step using VR-based experimental tools.
Learners can propose three or more personalized learning pathways by reorganizing educational modules based on demand analysis.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
